item.title: My First Post
item.description: Template post Add content Add a new page to your site. hugo new content content/posts/my-first-post.md Hugo created the file in the content/posts directory. Open the file with your editor. +++ title = 'My First Post' date = 2024-01-14T07:07:07+01:00 draft = true +++ Notice the draft value in the front matter is true. By default, Hugo does not publish draft content when you build the site. Learn more about draft, future, and expired content.
